specialAbilities.name: Air and Space
specialAbilities.description: All allied jets within 15" of Intrepid gain 3 ACC. If a jet is within 12" of Intrepid, Intrepid gains 3 ACC.

specialAbilities.name: A Fighting Ship
specialAbilities.description: Johnston gains +1 ACC and +1 EVA for every enemy ship within 9".

specialAbilities.name: Bastion of Defiance
specialAbilities.description: Non-US Allied Units within 12" of Regan gain 2 EVA

specialAbilities.name: Desperate Valor
specialAbilities.description: Cole cannot take more than 4 damage from one attack.

specialAbilities.name: To The Last
specialAbilities.description: If another Aircraft Carrier is in your fleet, Zuikaku gains 5 evasion.

specialAbilities.name: Calculated Punch
specialAbilities.description:
When attacking enemy battleships, add +4 POW to Kirishima’s attack, but reduce 
the result of that roll by one damage.

specialAbilities.name: Dark Luck
specialAbilities.description:
Whenever an allied ship sinks, place that ship's figure on Shigure's card. 
Shigure gains +2 EVA for every figure on her card.

specialAbilities.name: Surface Raider
specialAbilities.description: When attacking a unit with a lower cost then Graf Zeppelin, attack with +1 ACC.

specialAbilities.name: Terror of the Seas
specialAbilities.description: If Bismarck is the only battleships in your fleet, all of your other ships gain +1 EVA.
